data.eml:eml: Contribution to the knowledge of Afrotropical Dryinidae, Embolemidae and Sclerogibbidae (Hymenoptera), with description of new species from Central African Republic and Uganda

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Olmi, Massimo, van Noort, Simon, Guglielmino, Adalgisa (2016): Contribution to the knowledge of Afrotropical Dryinidae, Embolemidae and Sclerogibbidae (Hymenoptera), with description of new species from Central African Republic and Uganda. ZooKeys 578: 45-95, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.578.7820, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.578.7820
